Title: Buffer Overflow in node-weakauras-parser
Description: Affected versions of `node-weakauras-parser` are vulnerable to a Buffer Overflow. The `encode_weakaura` function fails to properly validate the input size. A buffer of bytes causes an overflow on systems. Upgrade to or later.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 1.0.4 before 1.0.5, all versions starting from 2.0.0 before 2.0.2, all versions starting from 3.0.0 before 3.0.1
NotImpacted: All versions before 1.0.4, all versions starting from 1.0.5 before 2.0.0, all versions starting from 2.0.2 before 3.0.0, all versions starting from 3.0.1
